name: Nutz of Equilibrium
description:
Theez is the god of the Balance and Equality in ancient Greek mythology. As the Overseer Greek deity, Theez is considered the ruler, protector, and stabilizer of all Systems and Mechanisms of the Universe. Theez is often depicted as a young man with a beard and is seen juggling the weight of the Nutz of Time and Space while maintaining the balance between the aforementioned Nutz.

This Game was made in 3 days for
